If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

32.parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
32.str2: (a) To call (name) by a supplementary (additional, alternative) name, (b) mid: To call upon, appeal to, address.
Of Latin origin; Caesar, a title of the Roman emperor.
